Class HighGround

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.surfaces.HighGround
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Tree, Wall
public abstract class HighGround
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
This class is responsible for any grounds which are high grounds
